channel.title: Guthans heal
channel.description: how would i make it so when you hit an npc what yo hit on the npc uget back in hp? coul someone give me the code, plzkthnx.

item.title: Guthans heal
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

iceyfang:

HOLY SHIT. That, is a lot of errors. All you need to do is copy and paste his command :. You shouldn’t be getting errors if you did. He knows what he is talking about so don’t say his command doesn’t work.

dude, dont bother trynig to give advice if you dont even know wtf im doing ffs…?

item.title: Guthans heal
item.dc:creator: @yurmoma1023 yurmoma1023
item.description:
@yurmoma1023 wrote:

isnt working for me
compiles fine but doesnt add any hp ever =
i added it here

[code]public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() {
if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 &&

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)

public void guthanHeal() {
if ((c.playerLevel[3] + hitDiff)
<= getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) {
c.playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
}

{
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

and i tryed moving it above the boolean

item.title: Guthans heal
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

eczema3:

How would I make it so when you hit an NPC what you hit on the npc, you get back in Hp? Could someone give me the code, please? Thank you!

Since you used correct english, sure!

if ((c.playerLevel[3] + hitDiff) <= c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) { c.playerLevel[3] += hitDiff;
Sorry For C’s, it’s in a Handler.

Read full topic
